leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-结构预测与评估生态
task_chain: 预测→精修→对齐→质量评估→可视化
tool_form: 推理框架 + 结构工具 + 可视化

tools.name: PiFold
tools.one_line_profile: Effective and efficient protein inverse folding model
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of PiFold, a method for protein inverse folding (designing sequences for a given backbone structure) presented at ICLR 2023.

tools.name: RFold
tools.one_line_profile: RNA secondary structure prediction using probabilistic matching
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of RFold (ICML'24), a method for deciphering RNA secondary structure prediction through a probabilistic K-Rook matching perspective.

tools.name: dyAb
tools.one_line_profile: Flow matching for flexible antibody design
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of dyAb (AAAI'25), utilizing flow matching for flexible antibody design with AlphaFold-driven pre-binding antigen conditioning.

tools.name: Alphafold2import
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to import AlphaFold2 models
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that facilitates the fetching and importing of AlphaFold2 predicted models hosted by EMBL directly into the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: AlphaFold-MCP-Server
tools.one_line_profile: Model Context Protocol server for AlphaFold Database
tools.detailed_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides programmatic access to the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database, enabling LLM agents or other tools to query protein structure data.

tools.name: PriFold
tools.one_line_profile: RNA secondary structure prediction with biological priors
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the AAAI'25 paper 'PriFold', which improves RNA secondary structure predictions by incorporating biological priors.

tools.name: IntaRNA
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient RNA target prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for efficient prediction of RNA-RNA interactions incorporating accessibility of interaction sites and seed regions.

tools.name: RNA-Playground
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization of RNA bioinformatics algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool to visualize the inner workings of RNA bioinformatics algorithms for structure prediction, interaction prediction, and sequence alignment.

tools.name: PolyFold
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visual simulator for protein folding
tools.detailed_description: An interactive visual simulator for distance-based protein folding, allowing users to explore folding dynamics and constraints.

tools.name: ProRNA3D-single
tools.one_line_profile: Single-sequence protein-RNA complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein-RNA complex structures from single sequences using biological language models.

tools.name: DIPS-Plus
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and tools for protein interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: The Enhanced Database of Interacting Protein Structures (DIPS-Plus) designed for training and evaluating interface prediction models.

tools.name: DProQ
tools.one_line_profile: Protein complex structure quality assessment
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for predicting the quality of protein complex structures (QA/Model Quality Assessment).

tools.name: MULTICOM3
tools.one_line_profile: Protein tertiary and quaternary structure prediction system
tools.detailed_description: A software system for improving AlphaFold2-based protein structure prediction, ranked among the best predictors in CASP15 (2022).

tools.name: MULTICOM4
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced protein structure prediction system
tools.detailed_description: The successor to MULTICOM3, a protein structure prediction system developed by the Bioinformatics and Machine Learning Lab at the University of Missouri.

tools.name: PoseBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for protein-ligand structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking tool for evaluating various protein-ligand structure prediction methods, presented at ICML 2024.

tools.name: SurfDock
tools.one_line_profile: Surface-informed diffusion model for protein-ligand docking
tools.detailed_description: A generative model using surface-informed diffusion for reliable and accurate prediction of protein-ligand complex structures.

tools.name: plddt2csv
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to extract AlphaFold2 metrics
tools.detailed_description: A tool to extract PAE and pLDDT values from AlphaFold2 output pickle files and convert them to PNG, CSV, and PDB formats for analysis.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold2-PPI
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale protein-protein interaction screening tool
tools.detailed_description: A fast deep learning method based on RoseTTAFold2 designed for large-scale screening of protein-protein interactions.

tools.name: S3F
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-Structure-Surface Model for Protein Fitness
tools.detailed_description: A model for protein fitness prediction that integrates sequence, structure, and surface information (S3F).

tools.name: SiamDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-training protein encoder via diffusion trajectory prediction
tools.detailed_description: Code for pre-training a protein encoder using a Siamese Sequence-Structure Diffusion Trajectory Prediction approach.

tools.name: IPSAE
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring function for AlphaFold protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function designed to evaluate interprotein interactions in models predicted by AlphaFold2 and AlphaFold3.

tools.name: pcons-fold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein folding pipeline using PconsC and Rosetta
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for protein folding that integrates contact prediction from PconsC with Rosetta-based folding protocols.

tools.name: GCNfold
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight RNA secondary structure prediction model
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) based model for efficient and accurate RNA secondary structure prediction.

tools.name: NetSurfP-3.0
tools.one_line_profile: Protein secondary structure and solvent accessibility prediction
tools.detailed_description: The third version of NetSurfP, a tool for predicting protein secondary structure and relative solvent accessibility using deep learning.

tools.name: af2complex
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting protein-protein interactions with AlphaFold
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting direct protein-protein interactions and modeling protein complexes using AlphaFold deep learning models.

tools.name: Peptide_docking_with_AF2_and_RosettAfold
tools.one_line_profile: Protocol for peptide docking using AF2 and RoseTTAFold
tools.detailed_description: A workflow/protocol implementation for docking peptides to proteins using AlphaFold2 and RoseTTAFold, widely used as a reference implementation.

tools.name: BRAKER
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for gene structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for fully automated prediction of protein-coding gene structures in novel eukaryotic genomes using GeneMark and AUGUSTUS.

tools.name: GALBA
tools.one_line_profile: Gene structure prediction pipeline using protein homology
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for automated prediction of protein-coding gene structures in novel eukaryotic genomes, optimized for scenarios with available high-quality protein evidence.

tools.name: EquiFold
tools.one_line_profile: Coarse-grained protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of EquiFold, a method for protein structure prediction utilizing a novel coarse-grained structure representation.

tools.name: IgFold
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate antibody structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for fast and accurate prediction of antibody structures, trained on a massive set of natural antibodies.

tools.name: alphafold-optimized
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized version of AlphaFold2
tools.detailed_description: An optimized implementation of AlphaFold2 based on OpenFold, designed for improved performance or efficiency.

tools.name: AF_Cluster
tools.one_line_profile: Predict multiple protein conformations with AlphaFold2
tools.detailed_description: A method to predict multiple protein conformations by clustering sequences and using them as input to AlphaFold2.

tools.name: EquiBind
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein-ligand binding
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning model for fast prediction of the 3D structure of protein-ligand binding complexes.

tools.name: OmegaFold
tools.one_line_profile: High-resolution protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A protein structure prediction model that achieves high accuracy without the need for Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSAs) in inference.

tools.name: PymolFold
tools.one_line_profile: Protein folding interface in PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that integrates protein folding capabilities directly into the visualization software.

tools.name: PhysDock
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-guided diffusion model for docking
tools.detailed_description: A physics-guided all-atom diffusion model for accurate prediction of protein-ligand complex structures.

tools.name: FoldCraft
tools.one_line_profile: Fold-conditioned protein design pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A protein design pipeline based on AlphaFold2 Multimer hallucination, conditioned on specific folds.

tools.name: StaB-ddG
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting mutational effects on protein binding stability from folding energy
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for predicting the changes in binding free energy (ddG) upon mutations, leveraging protein folding energy landscapes.

tools.name: AlphaFold3-Impl
tools.one_line_profile: Open source implementation of the AlphaFold3 protein structure prediction model
tools.detailed_description: An open-source PyTorch implementation of AlphaFold3, enabling structure prediction of protein complexes and interactions.

tools.name: LinearFold
tools.one_line_profile: Linear-time RNA secondary structure prediction algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient algorithm for RNA secondary structure prediction that scales linearly with sequence length, enabling analysis of long RNA sequences.

tools.name: LinearTurboFold
tools.one_line_profile: Linear-time algorithm for RNA structural alignment and conserved structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end linear-time tool for structural alignment and prediction of conserved structures in RNA homologs, part of the LinearFold suite.

tools.name: PSC-CPI
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-scale protein sequence-structure contrasting for compound-protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for predicting compound-protein interactions (CPI) by contrasting protein sequence and structure features at multiple scales.

tools.name: TANGO
tools.one_line_profile: Target Aware No-code neural network Generation and Operation framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to facilitate the generation and operation of neural networks for target-aware applications, likely in drug discovery contexts.

tools.name: RNAGym
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for RNA fitness and structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite and resource designed to evaluate models for RNA fitness landscapes and structure prediction tasks.

tools.name: HalluDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Hallucination-driven framework for protein sequence and structure co-design
tools.detailed_description: An all-atom framework that leverages structure prediction models in a hallucination loop to co-optimize and design novel protein sequences and structures.

tools.name: Proteina
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale flow-based protein backbone generator
tools.detailed_description: A generative model for protein backbones utilizing flow-based matching and hierarchical fold class conditioning, developed by NVIDIA.

tools.name: TwoFold_DL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for protein-ligand complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool from ORNL for predicting the 3D structure of protein-ligand complexes directly from sequences and SMILES strings.

tools.name: ProteinGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal LLM for protein property prediction and structure understanding
tools.detailed_description: A large language model adapted for protein science, capable of predicting protein properties and understanding structural features from multimodal inputs.

tools.name: 3DFI
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for protein structure prediction and 3D homology search
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that automates the prediction of 3D protein structures and performs structural homology searches in 3D space.

tools.name: AlphaLink2
tools.one_line_profile: Integrating crosslinking MS data into Uni-Fold-Multimer
tools.detailed_description: A tool that incorporates experimental crosslinking mass spectrometry data into protein complex structure prediction workflows using Uni-Fold-Multimer.

tools.name: AF2_peptide_hallucination
tools.one_line_profile: Peptide binder design using AlphaFold2 hallucination
tools.detailed_description: A method for designing peptide binders to flexible targets by leveraging AlphaFold2's hallucination capabilities.

tools.name: DeepAb
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning models for antibody structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A specialized deep learning framework for predicting the 3D structures of antibodies, including Fv region modeling.

tools.name: RFDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Protein hallucination and inpainting with RoseTTAFold
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for de novo protein design, including hallucination and inpainting tasks, built upon the RoseTTAFold architecture.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based protein structure prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A pioneering deep learning method for accurate protein structure prediction, capable of handling single chains and complexes.

tools.name: Protein Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Joint sequence and structure generation with RoseTTAFold diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model for simultaneous generation of protein sequences and structures, leveraging RoseTTAFold.

tools.name: AiCE
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting high-fitness mutations using inverse folding models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for identifying high-fitness protein mutations by utilizing protein inverse folding models to score sequence likelihoods given a structure.

tools.name: PROST
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting effects of missense mutations on protein stability
tools.detailed_description: A tool that predicts protein stability changes upon missense mutations using sequence data and AlphaFold2-predicted structures.

tools.name: xfold
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch reimplementation of AlphaFold3
tools.detailed_description: An open-source PyTorch implementation aiming to democratize access to the AlphaFold3 architecture for protein structure prediction.

tools.name: GCNdesign
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Network for protein sequence design
tools.detailed_description: A neural network model based on Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) for predicting amino acid sequences that fit a given protein backbone structure (inverse folding).

tools.name: AIRFold
tools.one_line_profile: AIRFold Protein Structure Prediction System
tools.detailed_description: A protein structure prediction system developed by THU-ATOM, likely incorporating AI-based folding algorithms.

tools.name: PathGennie
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid generation of rare event pathways for protein folding/unfolding
tools.detailed_description: A tool using direction-guided adaptive sampling to generate pathways for rare events such as ligand unbinding and protein folding.

tools.name: alphafold_pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of AlphaFold
tools.detailed_description: An unofficial but widely recognized PyTorch implementation of DeepMind's AlphaFold algorithm for research purposes.

tools.name: TopoFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Topological transformer for protein-ligand interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing topological data analysis and transformers to predict interactions in protein-ligand complexes.

tools.name: LocalColabFold
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to run ColabFold locally
tools.detailed_description: A widely used tool that enables running ColabFold (optimized AlphaFold2) on local computing resources, bypassing Google Colab limitations.

tools.name: DeePiCt
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning pipeline for particle detection in Cryo-ET data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the automatic detection and segmentation of particles and cellular structures in 3D Cryo-ET data, utilizing convolutional neural networks for structural biology analysis.

tools.name: FDA
tools.one_line_profile: Folding-Docking-Affinity framework for protein-ligand prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework integrating folding, docking, and affinity prediction tasks to estimate protein-ligand binding properties.

tools.name: ParallelFold
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized optimization for AlphaFold inference
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of AlphaFold that separates CPU-intensive (MSA/template search) and GPU-intensive steps to accelerate batch structure prediction.

tools.name: MSAffect
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for evaluating AlphaFold2 robustness against MSA perturbations
tools.detailed_description: A computational pipeline designed to assess the structural sensitivity and confidence shifts of AlphaFold2 predictions by introducing adversarial perturbations to Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSAs).

tools.name: SIGN
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware Graph Neural Networks for binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Structure-aware Interactive Graph Neural Networks (SIGN) for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity, incorporating structural information into the learning process.

tools.name: BA-DDG
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse folding model for predicting mutational effects on PPI
tools.detailed_description: A Boltzmann-Aligned Inverse Folding Model designed to predict the effects of mutations on Protein-Protein Interactions (PPI), serving as a tool for protein engineering and interaction analysis.

tools.name: prosculpt
tools.one_line_profile: Protein design and sculpting using Rosetta and Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for protein design and structural sculpting that integrates Rosetta protocols with deep learning methods like RFDiff and AlphaFold2.

tools.name: ESMPair
tools.one_line_profile: Heterodimer protein complex prediction with PLMs
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging Protein Language Models (PLMs) to improve the prediction of heterodimer protein complex structures.

tools.name: phylogenomics_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for phylogenomic inference using single copy genes
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and workflows for inferring phylogenies between related taxa using single-copy nuclear genes and four-fold degenerate sites (4DTv), integrating with Orthofinder.

tools.name: cheap-proteins
tools.one_line_profile: Joint embedding framework for protein sequence and structure
tools.detailed_description: A framework for creating compressed joint embeddings of protein sequences and structures, facilitating efficient representation learning for protein folding models.

tools.name: ColabFold-Pipeline-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Pre/post-processing toolkit for ColabFold BATCH
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to assist with the preparation and analysis of data for ColabFold BATCH runs, streamlining the structure prediction workflow.

tools.name: OpenFold
tools.one_line_profile: Trainable PyTorch reproduction of AlphaFold 2
tools.detailed_description: A fully open-source, trainable, memory-efficient, and GPU-friendly PyTorch implementation of the AlphaFold 2 protein structure prediction system.

tools.name: OpenFold-3
tools.one_line_profile: Open source biomolecular structure prediction model based on AlphaFold3
tools.detailed_description: An open-source implementation of the AlphaFold 3 architecture for predicting the structures of biomolecular complexes including proteins, nucleic acids, and ligands.

tools.name: MCGLPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric representation learning for PPI property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework integrating molecular coarse-grained models into geometric representation learning to predict properties of protein-protein complexes.

tools.name: RNAformer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based RNA secondary structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A scalable deep learning model based on the Transformer architecture for accurate prediction of RNA secondary structures.

tools.name: LM-GVP
tools.one_line_profile: Generalizable framework for protein property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework combining Language Models and Geometric Vector Perceptrons (GVP) to predict protein properties from sequence and structure data.

tools.name: rnaseq-nf-google-cloud
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for RNA-Seq and structure prediction on Cloud
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based workflow for executing RNA-Seq analysis and protein structure prediction tasks on Google Cloud Platform.

tools.name: OpenProtein
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch framework for tertiary protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework implemented in PyTorch for the prediction of protein tertiary structures, designed for research and experimentation.

tools.name: GraphSite
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-DNA binding site prediction using graph transformers
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein-DNA binding sites by utilizing graph transformers and predicted protein structures.

tools.name: EigenFold
tools.one_line_profile: Generative protein structure prediction with diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: A generative model approach for protein structure prediction that uses diffusion models to sample conformational landscapes.

tools.name: DeepUrfold
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative models for exploring protein fold space
tools.detailed_description: A tool for exploring and analyzing the protein fold space using deep generative models, aiding in the understanding of structural relationships.

tools.name: DeepDriveMD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep-learning driven adaptive molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A framework that couples deep learning with molecular dynamics simulations to adaptively sample protein folding pathways and conformational changes.

tools.name: GhostFold
tools.one_line_profile: Database-free protein folding from single sequence
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurate protein folding prediction from a single sequence without relying on large databases, using structure-aware synthetic MSAs.

tools.name: MSMExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization system for Markov State Models
tools.detailed_description: A visualization library designed for analyzing and exploring Markov State Models (MSMs) of protein folding networks and dynamics.

tools.name: gfold
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of the G-FOLD algorithm
tools.detailed_description: An efficient C++ implementation of the G-FOLD algorithm, typically used for analyzing biological data (e.g., RNA-seq fold change or folding, context dependent).

tools.name: PyMOL-Color-AlphaFold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to color AlphaFold structures by pLDDT
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL extension script that automatically colors AlphaFold-predicted protein structures based on their per-residue confidence scores (pLDDT).

tools.name: msa-af2-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for structure-based MSAs with AlphaFold2
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed to compute Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSAs) utilizing AlphaFold2 models, facilitating structural analysis.

tools.name: FlashFold
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for protein and complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed for the prediction of protein tertiary structures and protein-protein complex structures.

tools.name: RNAiFold
tools.one_line_profile: Constraint programming for RNA inverse folding
tools.detailed_description: A tool using constraint programming algorithms to solve the RNA inverse folding problem, aiding in the design of RNA sequences with specific target structures.

tools.name: af2_conformations
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for multi-conformation prediction with AlphaFold2
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts that extend AlphaFold2 to facilitate the prediction and sampling of multiple protein conformational states.

tools.name: ProSPr
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Structure Prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: ProSPr (Protein Structure Prediction) is a deep learning-based tool for predicting protein distances and structures, developed as an accessible alternative for structure prediction tasks.

tools.name: Uni-Fold
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source platform for developing and training protein structure prediction models
tools.detailed_description: Uni-Fold is a comprehensive open-source platform developed by DP Technology for protein structure prediction. It reproduces AlphaFold's performance and provides efficient training and inference capabilities, serving as a foundation for developing new protein models.

tools.name: Uni-Fold-jax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX implementation of AlphaFold for training and inference
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of AlphaFold in JAX, optimized for training efficiency and reproducibility. It allows researchers to train AlphaFold-like models from scratch or fine-tune them on specific datasets.

tools.name: Revisiting-PLMs
tools.one_line_profile: Evolution-aware protein language models for function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library exploring and providing evolution-aware and alignment-free protein language models (PLMs) specifically designed for predicting protein functions and properties from sequences.

tools.name: EternaBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for evaluating RNA structure prediction algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite developed by the EternaGame project for evaluating the accuracy of RNA secondary structure prediction tools using diverse thermodynamic tasks and high-throughput datasets.

tools.name: EternaFold
tools.one_line_profile: RNA structure prediction tool trained on crowdsourced data
tools.detailed_description: An RNA secondary structure prediction algorithm that improves accuracy by learning from diverse crowdsourced data collected through the Eterna game, utilizing multitask learning techniques.

tools.name: SQUARNA
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for RNA secondary structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: SQUARNA is a tool designed for the prediction of RNA secondary structures, leveraging specific algorithms to model RNA base-pairing and folding patterns.

tools.name: AFM-LIS
tools.one_line_profile: Local Interaction Score calculation for AlphaFold-Multimer predictions
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate the Local Interaction Score (LIS) from AlphaFold-Multimer outputs, enhancing the discovery and validation of protein-protein interactions (PPIs) by providing a metric for interaction confidence.

tools.name: ProFOLD
tools.one_line_profile: Application for protein 3D structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based application for predicting the 3D structure of proteins from their amino acid sequences.

tools.name: BC-Design
tools.one_line_profile: Biochemistry-aware framework for inverse protein folding
tools.detailed_description: A framework for high-precision inverse protein folding (sequence design) that incorporates biochemical constraints and knowledge to improve the design of protein sequences for target structures.

tools.name: AlphaFold
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art protein structure prediction system
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of AlphaFold 2 by Google DeepMind, a revolutionary AI system that predicts a protein's 3D structure from its amino acid sequence with atomic accuracy.

tools.name: AlphaFold 3
tools.one_line_profile: Inference pipeline for AlphaFold 3
tools.detailed_description: The official inference pipeline for AlphaFold 3, capable of predicting the structure of complexes including proteins, nucleic acids, small molecules, ions, and modified residues.

tools.name: FragFold
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment binding prediction using ColabFold
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages ColabFold to predict the binding of protein fragments, useful for peptide docking and interaction site mapping.

tools.name: CoPRA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-RNA binding affinity prediction model
tools.detailed_description: CoPRA (Complex Structures for Protein-RNA Binding Affinity Prediction) bridges cross-domain pretrained sequence models with structural information to predict the binding affinity between proteins and RNA molecules.

tools.name: BPfold
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for RNA secondary structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: BPfold is a deep learning-based tool for generalizable prediction of RNA secondary structures, utilizing base pair motif energy concepts to improve accuracy.

tools.name: FastFold
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance optimization for AlphaFold training and inference
tools.detailed_description: FastFold optimizes the training and inference of AlphaFold on GPU clusters, significantly reducing computational costs and time through techniques like kernel optimization and distributed parallelism.

tools.name: SPANNER
tools.one_line_profile: Reconstruction algorithm for photoacoustic imaging
tools.detailed_description: Superiorized Photo-Acoustic Non-NEgative Reconstruction (SPANNER) is an algorithm for real-time reconstruction of photoacoustic images, addressing limitations in viewing angles and imaging depth in clinical settings.

tools.name: cu-tsp
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure prediction using embeddings and deep learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a protein structure prediction method utilizing embeddings and deep learning representations, developed for accurate structural inference.

tools.name: FrameDiPT
tools.one_line_profile: SE(3) diffusion model for protein structure inpainting
tools.detailed_description: FrameDiPT is an SE(3) equivariant diffusion model designed for protein structure inpainting, allowing for the generation and completion of protein backbones.

tools.name: LightMHC
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight GNN model for pMHC structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) based model for predicting the structure of peptide-MHC (pMHC) complexes, optimized for efficiency and accuracy in immunological applications.

tools.name: ManyFold
tools.one_line_profile: Library for training and validating protein folding models
tools.detailed_description: An efficient and flexible library designed to facilitate the training, validation, and development of protein folding models, providing standardized components and workflows.

tools.name: RaptorX-Contact
tools.one_line_profile: Deep residual network for protein contact and distance prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool from the Xu group for predicting protein contact maps and distance matrices, which are critical intermediate steps for accurate 3D structure reconstruction.

tools.name: SPOT-RNA
tools.one_line_profile: RNA secondary structure prediction using ensemble deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting RNA secondary structures using an ensemble of two-dimensional deep neural networks and transfer learning techniques.

tools.name: SPOT-RNA2
tools.one_line_profile: Improved RNA secondary structure prediction with evolutionary profiles
tools.detailed_description: An enhanced version of SPOT-RNA that incorporates evolutionary profiles, mutational coupling, and 2D transfer learning to improve the accuracy of RNA secondary structure prediction.

tools.name: GraphSol
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware protein solubility prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein solubility from sequence data using graph convolutional networks (GCN) and predicted contact maps, integrating structural awareness into solubility analysis.

tools.name: DeepProtein
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library and benchmark for protein sequence learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library and benchmark suite for applying deep learning to protein sequence tasks, facilitating the development and evaluation of new models.

tools.name: ProteusAI
tools.one_line_profile: Library for ML-driven protein engineering and structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: ProteusAI is a library designed for protein engineering workflows, supporting tasks ranging from structure prediction and mutational effect prediction to analyzing protein-ligand interactions.

tools.name: biovec
tools.one_line_profile: ProtVec implementation for protein feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of ProtVec (protein vectors) used for representing protein sequences as continuous vectors, facilitating tasks like interaction prediction, structure analysis, and visualization.

tools.name: MiniFold
tools.one_line_profile: Simple, fast, and accurate protein structure prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight implementation for protein structure prediction, designed to be simple and fast while maintaining accuracy.

tools.name: EMBER3D
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast in-silico structure mutation and fitness prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the effects of mutations on protein structure and fitness using embeddings, enabling rapid in-silico mutagenesis.

tools.name: AlphaFold2 non-docker
tools.one_line_profile: Script suite for running AlphaFold2 without Docker
tools.detailed_description: A setup and execution utility that allows users to run AlphaFold2 in environments where Docker is not available or preferred, such as certain HPC clusters.

tools.detailed_description: An extensible deep learning framework for recognizing crystal structure types, utilizing a Crystal Structure Type Recognition Network (CSTRNet) composed of multiple ResNet-Confidence Network (RCNet) submodels to handle variable inputs.

tools.name: protein_shapes
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics for evaluating distributional coverage of protein structure generative models
tools.detailed_description: A set of metrics designed to assess how well generative models of protein structures cover the distribution of natural protein shapes, aiding in the validation and quality assessment of protein design algorithms.

tools.name: qmeans
tools.one_line_profile: Q-Means quantum clustering algorithm implementation compatible with Scikit-Learn
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Q-Means clustering algorithm using Qiskit, designed to be compatible with Scikit-Learn for integrating quantum computing methods into classical machine learning workflows.

tools.name: Ramachandran-Plot
tools.one_line_profile: R and Python utilities for generating Ramachandran plots
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool providing R and Python scripts to generate Ramachandran plots, which are essential for validating the stereochemical quality of protein structures by visualizing backbone dihedral angles.

tools.name: Neural Ocean
tools.one_line_profile: Underwater waste detection and water quality assessment toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A project addressing ocean pollution through YoloV8-based underwater waste detection, rule-based aquatic habitat assessment, and machine learning models for classifying water suitability for drinking or irrigation.

tools.name: ArchABM
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-based simulator for air quality and pandemic risk in architectural spaces
tools.detailed_description: An agent-based modeling (ABM) simulator designed to assess air quality and pandemic transmission risks within architectural spaces, facilitating public health and environmental design analysis.

tools.name: iEnhancer-DCLA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning predictor for DNA enhancers and their strength
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method (iEnhancer-DCLA) utilizing CNN, BiLSTM, and attention mechanisms to identify DNA enhancers and predict their strength from sequence data, aiding in gene transcription regulation analysis.

tools.name: alphafold_coloring
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to color AlphaFold predicted structures by pLDDT scores
tools.detailed_description: A utility to visualize AlphaFold confidence metrics by coloring predicted protein structures based on their per-residue pLDDT scores, facilitating quick visual quality assessment.

tools.name: ramachandraw
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool for drawing Ramachandran plots
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating Ramachandran plots to visualize and validate protein backbone dihedral angles (phi/psi), supporting structural biology quality control workflows.

tools.name: insilico_design_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for evaluating protein structure diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: An in-silico design pipeline specifically built to evaluate the performance and quality of protein structures generated by diffusion models, supporting the development of generative protein design tools.

tools.name: ProteinNet
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized dataset for machine learning of protein structure
tools.detailed_description: A standardized data set designed for training and evaluating machine learning models for protein structure prediction, providing sequence and structure data in a machine-learning-ready format.

tools.name: MRI-QA
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for MRI image quality assessment
tools.detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) based model for automating the quality assessment of 3D MRI volumes, trained on multi-site datasets (ABIDE 1) to identify artifacts and ensure data suitability for analysis.

tools.name: Sfcnn
tools.one_line_profile: 3D CNN scoring function for protein-ligand binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function model utilizing 3D convolutional neural networks to predict protein-ligand binding affinity, aiding in virtual screening and drug discovery processes.

tools.name: AFQuickPlot
tools.one_line_profile: Notebook for plotting AlphaFold MSAs, pLDDT, and PAE
tools.detailed_description: A ready-to-use Jupyter notebook for visualizing key AlphaFold outputs, including Multiple Sequence Alignments (MSA), per-residue confidence (pLDDT), and Predicted Aligned Error (PAE), essential for interpreting structure predictions.

tools.name: PXDesignBench
tools.one_line_profile: Unified evaluation suite for protein design models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking suite for evaluating protein design algorithms, providing standardized metrics and protocols to assess the quality and diversity of designed protein structures.

tools.name: PXMeter
tools.one_line_profile: Structural quality assessment for biomolecular structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for assessing the structural quality of biomolecular structure prediction models, providing confidence metrics and validation scores to guide the usage of predicted structures.

tools.name: pymol-color-alphafold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to color AlphaFold structures by pLDDT confidence
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL extension that automatically colors AlphaFold-generated protein structures based on their pLDDT confidence scores, enabling immediate visual assessment of prediction reliability within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: PyRAMA
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the Ramachandran plot for protein structure validation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to calculate and visualize Ramachandran plots, which are essential for validating the stereochemical quality of protein structures by analyzing backbone dihedral angles.

tools.name: deltaVinaXGB
tools.one_line_profile: Machine-learning based scoring function for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function that uses XGBoost and descriptors derived from AutoDock Vina to predict protein-ligand binding affinity, serving as a quality assessment tool for docking poses.

tools.name: UMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection for dimension reduction and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose dimension reduction technique widely used in scientific data analysis (e.g., single-cell genomics, structural landscapes) to visualize and cluster high-dimensional data.

tools.name: ProteinGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Networks for protein model quality assessment
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool using Graph Convolutional Networks to predict the quality (score) of protein structure models, aiding in model selection and validation.

tools.name: FS-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Few-shot learning dataset and benchmark for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and benchmark suite for evaluating few-shot learning models on molecular property prediction tasks, facilitating the development of models that generalize to new chemical spaces.

tools.name: RAMAplot
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for Ramachandran plots for PDB structures and MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate Ramachandran plots for single PDB structures and heatmaps for Molecular Dynamics (MD) trajectories, aiding in the validation of protein backbone conformations.

tools.name: NolinearTimeSeriesAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for nonlinear time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for performing nonlinear time series analysis on single or multi-channel data. It includes methods for phase space reconstruction (Taken's embedding), estimation of optimal delay and dimension, and construction of recurrence networks for complexity analysis.

tools.name: OpenMapFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid map creation with machine learning and earth observation data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating maps using machine learning and Earth observation data, developed by NASA Harvest. It facilitates the processing of satellite imagery for agricultural and environmental monitoring.

tools.name: RF-Score-VS
tools.one_line_profile: Random forest based protein-ligand scoring function
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function based on Random Forest for protein-ligand interactions, specifically designed for Virtual Screening applications to predict binding affinity or pose quality.

tools.name: MolProbity
tools.one_line_profile: Protein and nucleic acid structure validation tool
tools.detailed_description: A widely used system for structure validation of proteins and nucleic acids. It provides detailed all-atom contact analysis, geometry checks, and quality scores (MolProbity score) to assess the physical realism of macromolecular structures.

tools.name: DLSCORE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based protein-ligand binding affinity scoring
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based scoring function designed to predict the binding affinity of protein-ligand complexes, useful for evaluating docked poses and virtual screening.

tools.name: OPUS-CSF
tools.one_line_profile: C-atom-based scoring function for ranking protein structural models
tools.detailed_description: A scoring function that uses C-atom coordinates to rank protein structural models. It is part of the OPUS series of methods and is designed to evaluate the quality of predicted protein structures.

tools.name: SDOCK2.0
tools.one_line_profile: FFT-based global protein-protein docking program
tools.detailed_description: A global protein-protein docking program that utilizes Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) and incorporates stepwise force field potentials in its scoring function to predict protein complex structures.

tools.name: DockQ
tools.one_line_profile: Quality measure for protein-protein docking models
tools.detailed_description: A standard quality measure for evaluating protein-protein docking models. It combines Fnat, LRMS, and iRMS into a single score to assess the accuracy of a docked complex against a reference structure.

tools.name: ProQDock
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Protein docking scoring program
tools.detailed_description: A scoring program for protein-protein docking models that uses Support Vector Regression (SVR) trained on high-level coordinate-driven features (all-atom and interface) to predict model quality.

tools.name: OnionNet-SFCT
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based scoring function correction term for protein-ligand docking
tools.detailed_description: OnionNet-SFCT is a deep learning model designed to improve the accuracy of protein-ligand docking and virtual screening. It acts as a scoring function correction term (SFCT) that refines the scoring of docked poses, thereby enhancing the reliability of structure-based drug design workflows.

tools.name: Omni-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask molecular model for any-to-any modalities
tools.detailed_description: A multitask molecular model designed to handle any-to-any modalities, implemented as part of a NeurIPS 2025 research contribution.

tools.name: 3Dmol.js
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL accelerated JavaScript molecular graphics library
tools.detailed_description: A widely used, object-oriented, WebGL-based JavaScript library for visualizing molecular data in web browsers, supporting various molecular file formats and rendering styles.

tools.name: jupyterlab_3Dmol
tools.one_line_profile: JupyterLab extension for py3Dmol
tools.detailed_description: A JupyterLab extension that enables the embedding and interaction with 3D molecular structures using the py3Dmol library within the JupyterLab environment.

tools.name: molview
tools.one_line_profile: IPython/Jupyter widget for interactive molecular visualization based on Mol*
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget that integrates the Mol* (Molstar) framework for high-performance molecular visualization directly into IPython and Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: nano-protein-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: VSCode extension for visualizing protein structures using Mol*
tools.detailed_description: A Visual Studio Code extension that provides a lightweight interface for visualizing protein structures (PDB/CIF) directly within the editor using the Mol* framework.

tools.name: MicrobeTrace
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization multitool for molecular epidemiology and bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive visualization tool developed for molecular epidemiology, enabling the integration and analysis of contact tracing networks and genomic data.

tools.name: ADplugin

tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that facilitates the setup, execution, and analysis of molecular docking simulations using AutoDock and AutoDock Vina directly within the PyMOL interface.

tools.name: KinaseDocker2
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for kinase inhibitor binding and affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A specialized PyMOL plugin and Docker environment for predicting the binding modes and affinities of kinase inhibitors.

tools.name: Semagrams.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical editor for graph-like structures in scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A Julia-based graphical editor for creating and manipulating graph-like structures, often used in applied category theory and scientific modeling.

tools.name: BioViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Protein viewer for iOS and macOS using SwiftUI and Metal
tools.detailed_description: A native application for Apple devices to visualize protein structures (PDB, CIF, XYZ) with high performance using the Metal graphics API.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular docking protocols in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Jupyter Notebooks providing a workflow for interactive molecular docking, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

tools.name: shiny.molstar

tools.detailed_description: An R package that wraps the Mol* library, allowing users to embed interactive molecular visualizations within R Shiny web applications.

tools.name: molecular-design-toolkit

tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by Autodesk providing Python interfaces for molecular design, simulation, and visualization, optimized for use in Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: molecule-3d-for-react

tools.name: notebook-molecular-visualization

tools.detailed_description: A library for embedding 2D and 3D molecular visualizations in Jupyter notebooks, leveraging 3Dmol.js and D3.js for rendering.

tools.name: PyMOL-PUB
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid generation of high-quality structure figures for publication
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL script/plugin designed to streamline the creation of publication-quality molecular structure figures with predefined styles and settings.

tools.name: Azahar

tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin specifically developed for the modeling, visualization, and structural analysis of glycan molecules.

tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis, capable of computing molecular features and predicting properties of small molecules.

tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the rapid analysis and visualization of large datasets of atomic structures, including crystal and molecular systems.

tools.detailed_description: A port of the Jmol molecular visualization software to JavaScript via SwingJS, enabling Jmol features in web environments.

tools.name: Molecules

tools.name: MoleculesMac

tools.detailed_description: The macOS desktop version of the Molecules application for 3D molecular visualization.

tools.name: MolecularNodes

tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on that enables the import and high-quality rendering/animation of molecular structures using Blender's Geometry Nodes system.

tools.name: MOL

tools.detailed_description: A computer vision model for the joint estimation of micro-expressions, optical flow, and landmarks, published in TPAMI 2025.

tools.name: Caleydo

tools.detailed_description: A visualization framework and suite of tools designed for the exploration and analysis of molecular biology data, including gene expression and pathways.

tools.detailed_description: A utility to send data to and control a local PyMOL instance from a remote server, facilitating visualization workflows in distributed environments.

tools.detailed_description: A molecular visualization framework designed to display and annotate macromolecular structures.

tools.name: JChemPaint

tools.detailed_description: Web-based software for the interactive visualization of molecular maps (e.g., metabolomics, proteomics) on 2D and 3D models, facilitating spatial analysis of molecular data.

tools.name: Avogadro

tools.detailed_description: An advanced molecular editor and visualizer designed for cross-platform use in computational chemistry, molecular modeling, bioinformatics, and materials science.

tools.detailed_description: The core libraries providing 3D rendering, visualization, analysis, and data processing capabilities for the Avogadro molecular editor and other computational chemistry applications.

tools.name: BioBlender21

tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Blender designed to process biological data and perform molecular visualization work, serving as a modern iteration or fork of the BioBlender project.

tools.name: molorbdraw

tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for visualizing molecular orbitals by processing cube files, useful for quantum chemistry and electronic structure analysis.

tools.name: Pymol-script-repo

tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive repository of scripts for PyMOL, providing various extensions and utilities for structural biology visualization and analysis, maintained by the community.

tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Co-Optimal Transport (COOT) algorithm, which optimizes the transport plan between two datasets by simultaneously aligning their samples and features. Useful in machine learning and potential omics data alignment.

tools.name: UCSF ChimeraX

tools.detailed_description: The source code for UCSF ChimeraX, a highly extensible program for interactive visualization and analysis of molecular structures and related data, including density maps, supramolecular assemblies, and sequence alignments.

tools.name: PyRosetta Viewer3D

tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool that allows users to display and interact with Rosetta PackedPose objects, Pose objects, or PDB files directly within a Jupyter notebook or Google Colab environment, facilitating interactive modeling workflows.

tools.name: Molly

tools.detailed_description: An AI model specifically trained or fine-tuned to process and interpret multi-omics data, aiming to bridge the gap between biological data modalities and natural language queries.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D

tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB program for solving fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in a 2D linear-elastic solid. It uses the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM) to discretize the solid continuum with cracks as discontinuities.

tools.name: molecular-ts

tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool for virtual chemistry and particle automata, visualizing the behavior of particles in 2D and 3D space. It is positioned for artificial life research and educational visualization of molecular dynamics concepts.

tools.name: MDV

tools.detailed_description: Multi-Dimensional Visualization (MDV) is an open-source toolkit designed for the analysis and visualization of spatial and molecular datasets, developed by the Taylor Computational Chemical Biology Group.

tools.name: VisualFactory

tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts designed to produce high-quality, cinematic visualizations of molecular structures, bridging scientific accuracy with visual impact for presentations and publications.

tools.name: AMDock

tools.name: AMDock-win

tools.detailed_description: The Windows compatible version of AMDock, providing a graphical interface for assisted molecular docking using AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina.

tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library and tool for visualizing macromolecular structures and mapping sequence annotations (such as domains, variants, and binding sites) onto the 3D structure in an interactive web environment.

tools.name: RMD_Digging
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization toolkit for Reactive Molecular Dynamics (ReaxFF)
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolkit for pre-processing and post-processing ReaxFF molecular dynamics simulations. It includes features for parameter formatting, structural analysis, trajectory statistics, and mechanism analysis.

tools.name: Uni-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Universal 3D molecular representation learning framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for 3D molecular representation learning. It provides pre-trained models and tools for various downstream tasks, including molecular property prediction, 3D conformation generation, and structure-based analysis.

tools.name: HotSpot3D
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identifying 3D proximity of mutations in protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for analyzing mutation data in the context of 3D protein structures. It identifies spatial clusters of mutations (hotspots) and potential drug-binding sites, aiding in the interpretation of cancer genomics data.

tools.name: show_contacts
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for visualizing polar contacts and interactions
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL script/plugin designed to identify and visualize polar contacts and other non-covalent interactions within protein structures or protein-ligand complexes, facilitating structural analysis.

tools.name: BlendMol
tools.one_line_profile: Blender plugin for importing VMD visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A Blender plugin that allows users to import visualization states from VMD (Visual Molecular Dynamics) into Blender. This enables the creation of high-quality, ray-traced renderings of molecular scenes prepared in VMD.

tools.name: Pyrite
tools.one_line_profile: Blender plugin for importing molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool that facilitates the import of molecular dynamics trajectories into Blender for high-quality visualization and animation. It supports various molecular representations and allows for cinematic rendering of simulation data.

tools.name: Miew
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance web-based molecular viewer
tools.detailed_description: A 3D molecular viewer designed for web applications, capable of rendering large biomolecular structures. It supports various display modes, coloring schemes, and file formats, making it suitable for embedding in scientific web platforms.

tools.name: GRADE
tools.one_line_profile: Code for determining and analyzing clathrate hydrate structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to analyze atomic positions of water molecules to identify and classify clathrate hydrate cages (e.g., 5^12, 6^2 5^12). It can process trajectory data for visualization in VMD and calculate order parameters.

tools.name: qc_pymol
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for visualizing quantum chemistry outputs in PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts that bridge quantum chemistry programs with PyMOL, allowing for the visualization of orbitals, densities, and other QC calculation results within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: ferritin
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for protein structure manipulation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based library providing utilities for handling protein structure data (PDB/mmCIF). It aims to offer high-performance tools for parsing, analyzing, and manipulating macromolecular structures.

tools.name: vmd_density_profile
tools.one_line_profile: VMD tool for computing 1-D atomic densities
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin that calculates one-dimensional atomic density profiles from molecular dynamics simulations. It is useful for analyzing the distribution of species across membranes or interfaces.

tools.name: vmd_diffusion_coefficient
tools.one_line_profile: VMD tool for computing diffusion coefficients
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin designed to calculate diffusion coefficients from molecular dynamics trajectories using the Einstein relation (MSD). It simplifies the analysis of transport properties in simulation data.

tools.name: MolMil
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL-based molecular viewer for PDB and mmCIF formats
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, web-based molecular viewer capable of rendering structures from PDB and mmCIF files. It utilizes WebGL for high-performance rendering in the browser.

tools.name: molvwr
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL-based molecular viewer using Babylon.js

tools.name: mdciao
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization tool for molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the accessible analysis and visualization of molecular dynamics (MD) simulation data, with a focus on residue-residue contacts and geometric properties.

tools.name: robocrystallographer
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic generation of crystal structure descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates human-readable text descriptions of crystal structures from standard structure files (e.g., CIF), facilitating the interpretation and reporting of materials science data.

tools.name: md-analysis-tools

tools.name: esigen
